text: Welcome Astronaut. You have been de-attached from the command pod and are hurtling towards the lunar surface and approximately 2000 m/s. Connection to mission control has been lost in the aforementioned accident. Finding a better landing spot is imperative.
question: Time is of the essence, we could quicky identify a few suitable landing spots or we could make a more thoughrough scan of the lunar surface and the surrounding atmosphere.
